articles.title: RBI to allow auto refill of UPI Lite wallet soon, here's what Governor Shaktikanta Das said… | Mint - Mint
articles.description: This means that customers will no longer have to manually refill their UPI Lite wallets, but it will refill automatically, once a threshold amount set by the customer is reached.
articles.content: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) on June 7 announced the introduction of auto-replenishment of UPI Lite wallet, under its emandate framework. This was announced by RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das during … [+2621 chars]
